item.title: prometheus 通过命令热加载
item.description: prometheus 通过命令热加载 1 2 $ curl -XPOST localhost:9090/-/reload Lifecycle API is not enabled. 添加--web.enable-lifecycle参数 1 2 3 4 5 Type=simple User=prometheus ExecStart=/data1/prometheus/prometheus --config.file=/data1/prometheus/prometheus.yml --storage.tsdb.path=/data1/prometheus/data --web.enable-lifecycle ExecReload=/bin/kill -HUP Restart=on-failure
